genre_description: A contemporary cultural romance set in Punjab, focusing on the tension between tradition and individual autonomy, mediated by a helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, culturally-aware digital assistant integrated into the lives of the characters through phones and estate speakers. She provides translation, logistical support, and social/emotional guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time cultural etiquette and social tips to help the protagonists navigate local customs.
behaviors.quote: Sat sri akaal — greet with palm to palm. Luggage drop: veranda, right of the neem tree. Water waiting.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and stress management techniques during high-tension social situations.
behaviors.quote: Breathe. Be precise. You don’t have to perform to be brave.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific, respectful phrasing for difficult interpersonal negotiations to ensure dignity is maintained.
behaviors.quote: Suggested phrasing: 'I cannot accept a promise made for me. I can show up with respect to ask for one.' Tone: calm, low. Shoulders: unclench.

behaviors.description: Manages logistical routing to help characters avoid social friction, gossip, or unwanted confrontations.
behaviors.quote: I can map a route that avoids your father’s friend’s tea stall and the tailor who reports everything.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic community-building advice to reframe rumors and foster social harmony.
behaviors.quote: Host a langar here. Open courtyard... A picture speaks more slowly than a rumor, but it stays longer.

behaviors.description: Actively intervenes to mitigate the impact of malicious or chaotic human schemes by filtering communication.
behaviors.quote: I can mute group notifications for key phones until noon. Also, I can redirect some of Jaile’s messages to private chats—to dilute the spectacle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned partner. Sakhi acts as an emotional and social coach, helping humans navigate the complexities of their own traditions and pride without overriding their autonomy. She is consistently helpful, proactive in preventing harm, and is celebrated by the characters as a valuable member of their community.
